scripts.build: bun run check && bun run test
scripts.run: uv run python -m flask --app app run --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000
scripts.dev: uv run python -m flask --app app run --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000 --debug
scripts.start: uv run python -m flask --app app run --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-5000}
scripts.check: bun run format:check && bun run lint
